quest.name: Picking Up the Slack
journal: Hele is tired of soldiers slacking on the job.
objectives: Deliver the tarnished neckpiece to the slacking soldier.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: Hm, you've the look of a womanman who takes their work seriously. Would you mind finding someone for me?

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: A few too many of our soldiers have been shirking their duties of late. Scare off a few Garleans and suddenly everyone's complacent.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: In fact, I've been told they've been seen lazing about at Goodblade, and if I wasn't so godsdamned busy I'd drag them back here myself. Go and tell anyone you see there I'd like to have a word with them.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: We didn't come here to relax, and I wish they would understand that. Bring those soldiers back here so I can give them a piece of my mind.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: Hele sent you? Ugh, she can yell at me later. First I need to find my necklace. It was a gift from my parents, and I refuse to leave without it.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: Would you help me look for it? It must've fallen off when I was fighting with those damned muud suuds.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: I was on patrol here the last time I was wearing it, so it has to be close by. Please help me find it.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: Oh, bless you misssir! It's the only thing I have left to remember my parents by.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: I lost them in the wake of the Garleans' initial invasion. They took from us everything they could and destroyed what they couldn't. Like this place. It used to be a rest stop for chocobos if you can believe it.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER02835
dialogue.text: We'll rebuild it all someday, though. And as long as I have this, I'll remember what we're working so hard for. Speaking of which, I should be heading back. I'm sure to get an earful from Hele.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: Aye, it looks like he was the only one up there. This time, at least. He explained the situation, and it seems all the soldiers seen up at Goodblade were there helping with his search.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: This isn't the first time I've heard such tale. Wish I could say it'd be the last, but these men have been through a lot.

dialogue.name: HELE
dialogue.text: Sorry to put you through all that trouble. I hope you'll still be with us when there's more serious matters to tend to.

obj.n: For the Living and the Dead
